keyPolicies.policyDescription: Balance budget by 2018, cut taxes for low and middle income workers, create new jobs
Bringing back proper checks so we know who’s entering and leaving the UK.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Residents know elections here in Eastleigh will be between the Lib Dems and Conservatives. Labour and UKIP finished in poor third and fourth places at the last general election here.

issues.brexitEurope: Bringing back proper checks so we know who’s entering and leaving the UK.
issues.economy: An £800 Income Tax cut for 54,800 ordinary local workers. Halved the deficit and helped businesses create 1-9 million new jobs.
issues.immigration: Bringing back proper checks so we know who’s entering and leaving the UK.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RTLH-YZCX-BKXE, Eastleigh Liberal Democrats, 109 Leigh Road, Eastleigh SO50 9DR.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The tactical situation implies that voting for Labour or UKIP will just help the Conservative candidate.
